title: Will the game be available at worlds?
body: I'm attending worlds this year (msg semifinals) and I'm wondering if I'll be able to purchase the game on one of the riot merch stores.

replies.body: I can't confirm whether or not we'll have copies available for sale at Worlds, so best bet is to purchase from the Merch store when it goes live on 10/13.

In which category will MVM be available in? Because none of the ones so far dont suit a board game. I just want to know because if i miss the first wave, then i would be really upset {{champion:32}} .
This is something I'd like to know as well.

Even if it is possible ( even thought it looks like it is only avaiable from the online store ) i suggest you to not do that, the game looks big and heavy and with all the crowd and traveling involved it can be a problem :x
